title: Stranded Deep v0.03 - Hotfix 2 (64bit)
description:
Bug Fixes
Raft Motor Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Now requires a hammer to be built.
Fire Spit Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Now updates display name when attached cookable is cooked.
Shipwrecks Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Fixed visual error with glass shader not blending with fog.
Crafting Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Fixed Ã¢â‚¬Å“lashingÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ material name incorrectly appearing as Ã¢â‚¬Å“ropeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ in crafting optionÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s material list.
Building Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Fixed a bug where foundations would default to a raft when snapping to an existing foundation over water.
HUD Information Option Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Fixed a bug where toggling the display of item names was not applying in game.
Input Options Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Fixed a rather annoying bug for players where mouse buttons were reassigning as the mouse axis.
Goggles, Flippers and Torch Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Added a notification for now to notify player that these items have been equipped.
Flying Ã¢â‚¬â€œ The last known dragging-flying exploit, aka the Ã¢â‚¬Å“broomstickÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ method, has been fixed.
Water Bottles Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Fixed a bug with all food items not saving data. This would result in water bottles refilling when loaded back, etc.
Rafts Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Adjusted ladder colliders for wooden rafts for easier climbing.
Crabs Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Fixed immortal crabs when cooking alive. Crabs now die if you cook them alive by dragging onto a fire, etc.
Rain Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Fixed weather effects not having appropriate filter when underwater.

New Content
Saving Ã¢â‚¬â€œ ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s now possible to have multiple save game files. Your save file is now saved local to the gameÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s installation in a folder named after your Steam ID. It may look like a random series of numbers but it actually corresponds to your unique user ID on Steam. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s worth mentioning that there are a few ways to identify your Steam ID if you need to. A quick google search will help here.
Saving Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Internal optimisations to save file parser.
World Seed Ã¢â‚¬â€œ You can now share your world seed. You will be prompted to input a world seed when you select Ã¢â‚¬Å“New GameÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ on the main menu. You can view your world seed on the bottom right corner of the pause menu.
Player Ã¢â‚¬â€œ More randomized and more variety of player sound effects. Improved jumping sounds and more variety. Improved landing sounds and more variety. Vomitting sounds effects. Improved breathing sounds effects
Label Maker Ã¢â‚¬â€œ New item! A small side item that introduces a new mechanic to rename items if thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s your thing.

Balancing
Sharks Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Dynamically adjusted circling radius based on the damage dealt to the shark.
Sharks Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Less crazy raft bumping!
Sharks Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Temporary fix to spamming damage by holding down the use item key.
Sharks Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Will lose interest in players when on land.
Sharks Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Increased maximum damage: Tiger Sharks from 1000 to 2250, Great whites from 2000 to 3350.
Sharks Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Regain 0.5 health per second after 320 seconds have passed since last receiving damage.
Balance - Adjusted compass model holding view.
Balance Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Decreased various fish spawn chances. Sharks are now much rarer.

    Tiger shark from 100% to 30%,
    Great White from 100% to 18%,
    Reef Sharks from 100% to 25%,
    Marlin from 100% to 25%,
    Whales from 20% to 6%,
    Stingrays from 100% to 65%,
    Turtles from 100% to 55%.

Balance Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Loot container item spawn chance. Container slots now have a slight chance for spawning nothing (average 90% to spawn)
